trans-unit.source: Represents a button on a custom Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 表示自定义功能区上的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio creates an instance of a class that implements the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton> interface when you drag a **Button** control from the **Office Ribbon Controls** tab of the **Toolbox** onto the Ribbon Designer.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 将创建一个实现类的实例<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton>接口拖动时**按钮**控件从**Office 功能区控件**选项卡**工具箱**拖动到功能区设计器。

trans-unit.source: You can also create an instance of this control at run time and add it to a dynamic menu.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以在运行时创建此控件的实例，并将其添加到动态菜单。

trans-unit.source: A menu is dynamic if you set its <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Dynamic%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置动态菜单是其<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Dynamic%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Some properties of this control can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application or before the control is added to a dynamic menu at run time.
trans-unit.target: 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，或者在运行时将控件添加到动态菜单之前，可以设置此控件的某些属性。

trans-unit.source: For information about setting these properties, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关设置这些属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can create a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton> at run time by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.CreateRibbonButton%2A> method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton>通过使用在运行时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.CreateRibbonButton%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory>对象。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to access the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> object:
trans-unit.target: 可通过两种方法来访问 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> 对象：

trans-unit.source: By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Common Tasks
trans-unit.target: 常规任务

trans-unit.source: The following table lists members that are useful for common tasks.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用于常见任务的成员。

trans-unit.source: Task
trans-unit.target: 任务

trans-unit.source: Member
trans-unit.target: 成员

trans-unit.source: At run time, add a button to a menu that has its <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Dynamic%2A> property set to true.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，将按钮添加到菜单具有其<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Dynamic%2A>属性设置为 true。

trans-unit.source: Create an instance of a class that implements the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton> interface by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.CreateRibbonButton%2A>
trans-unit.target: 创建一个实现类的实例<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton>通过使用接口 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.CreateRibbonButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> class.
trans-unit.target: 方法的<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory>类。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Global Access to Objects in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/global-access-to-objects-in-office-projects.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[对 Office 项目中对象的全局访问](/visualstudio/vsto/global-access-to-objects-in-office-projects.md)。

trans-unit.source: Add the instance to the menu's `Items` collection.
trans-unit.target: 将实例添加到的菜单`Items`集合。

trans-unit.source: Change the size of the button.
trans-unit.target: 更改按钮的大小。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSize%2A> to the value you want.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSize%2A>到所需的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, for a large button, set it to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于大按钮，将其设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。

trans-unit.source: Display an image on the button.
trans-unit.target: 在按钮上显示图像。

trans-unit.source: There are three ways to display an image:
trans-unit.target: 有三种方法才会显示图像：

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property gives the most control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性提供的最大控制。

trans-unit.source: - Set <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A> to the ID of a built-in Microsoft Office image that you want to display as the icon for the button.
trans-unit.target: -将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A>为你想要显示为按钮的图标的内置 Microsoft Office 映像的 ID。

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ImageName%2A> property along with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> event.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ImageName%2A>属性连同<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property gives some performance benefits.
trans-unit.target: 此属性提供了一些性能优势。

trans-unit.source: Disable or hide buttons.
trans-unit.target: 禁用或隐藏按钮。

trans-unit.source: To disable a button, set <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl.Enabled%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用按钮，将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl.Enabled%2A>到`false`。

trans-unit.source: To hide a button, set <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl.Visible%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏按钮，将<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl.Visible%2A>到`false`。

trans-unit.source: Run code when a user clicks the button.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击按钮时运行代码。

trans-unit.source: Add code to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Click> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 将代码添加到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Click>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new button, sets various properties of the button, and then adds the button to a menu.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个新按钮，设置各种属性的按钮，然后将按钮添加到的菜单。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**到通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目的项。

trans-unit.source: Add a group to the custom tab.
trans-unit.target: 将组添加到自定义选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Add a menu to the group.
trans-unit.target: 向组添加一个菜单。

trans-unit.source: Set the **Dynamic** property of the menu to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 设置**动态**到的菜单属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Set the **ItemSize** property of the menu to **RibbonControlSizeLarge**.
trans-unit.target: 设置**ItemSize**到的菜单属性**RibbonControlSizeLarge**。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the button.
trans-unit.target: 在用户单击按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置按钮的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize</c> that represents the size of the button.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize</c>表示按钮的大小。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect if the button is part of a menu.
trans-unit.target: 如果按钮是菜单的一部分，则此属性无效。

trans-unit.source: A button that is part of a menu is always displayed as if its <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ControlSize%2A> property were set to the value of the parent menu's <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 始终显示属于一个菜单按钮就像其<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ControlSize%2A>属性已设置为父菜单的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To make buttons appear larger on a menu, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu> to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使按钮显示大菜单上，设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu>到`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。

trans-unit.source: The following example makes a button appear larger.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使看起来更大的按钮。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**到通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目的项。

trans-unit.source: Add a group to the custom tab.
trans-unit.target: 将组添加到自定义选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Add a button to the group.
trans-unit.target: 向组添加一个按钮。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that appears on this button in a menu when the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize" /> property of the menu is set to <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge</c>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在将菜单的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize" /> 属性设置为 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge</c> 时菜单中此按钮上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The description appears when this control is nested in another menu or split button, and the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize" /> property of the parent menu, or the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ItemSize" /> property of the split button, is set to <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge</c>.
trans-unit.target: 在此控件嵌套在另一个菜单或拆分按钮，描述将显示与<see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize" />父菜单的属性或<see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ItemSize" />的拆分按钮的属性设置为<c>将</c>。

trans-unit.source: This property can be changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 可以在运行时更改此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在按钮上显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that is displayed on the button.
trans-unit.target: 一个在按钮上显示的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: 建议的图像格式是 PNG，因为 PNG 格式的图像支持通过其 alpha 通道的透明度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A> property identifies an image that is displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A>属性标识由控件显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at design time or at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行时中更新此属性，将更新控件的外观，以反映更改。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A> property is set, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ImageName%2A> properties are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A>设置属性，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ImageName%2A>属性会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A> property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A>属性提供更好地控制比其他两个属性，因为每次对控件进行更新时，图像对象被发送到 Office 应用程序会比较慢。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A> property must be `true` for the control to display the image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A>属性必须为`true`要显示图像的控件。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A> property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A>属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A> property at run time, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A> property to `true` in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A>属性在运行时，你必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`在代码中。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A> property of two buttons.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A>两个按钮的属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**到通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目的项。

trans-unit.source: Add a group to the custom tab.
trans-unit.target: 将组添加到自定义选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Add two buttons to the group.
trans-unit.target: 将两个按钮添加到组。

trans-unit.source: Add two images to the project resources.
trans-unit.target: 将两个映像添加到的项目资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name that you can use to identify the button in the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage" /> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称可用于在 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage" /> 事件处理程序中标识按钮。

trans-unit.source: A string that you can use in the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage" /> event handler to identify the button.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，可用于在 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage" /> 事件处理程序中标识按钮。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关设置此属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ImageName%2A> property identifies an image that is displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ImageName%2A>属性标识由控件显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Office 应用程序检索此映像从你的解决方案一次，以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> event.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以设置仅在设计时，因为它标识的图像加载期间<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage>事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> 时将引发一次每个映像名称将显示功能区。

trans-unit.source: After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property.
trans-unit.target: 之后，无法使用此属性更改控件图像。

trans-unit.source: To load the image, add code to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要加载的映像，将代码添加到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs.ImageName%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs> and set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs.Image%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs> object to the image that you want to load.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs.ImageName%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs>并设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs.Image%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs>到想要加载的映像的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if either the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A> property or the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A>属性或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Images identified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ImageName%2A> property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A> property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 标识的图像<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ImageName%2A>属性可以由标识的图像以外会稍微快一些加载<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A>显示属性，因为 Office 应用程序将检索映像你解决方案仅在首次从功能区。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A> property must be `true` for the control to display the image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A>属性必须为`true`要显示图像的控件。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ImageName%2A> property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ImageName%2A>属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ImageName%2A> property at run time, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A> property to `true` in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ImageName%2A>属性在运行时，你必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`在代码中。

trans-unit.source: The following example caches the images for two buttons.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将缓存两个按钮的的图像。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**到通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目的项。

trans-unit.source: Add a group to the custom tab.
trans-unit.target: 将组添加到自定义选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Add two buttons to the group.
trans-unit.target: 将两个按钮添加到组。

trans-unit.source: Add two images to the project resources.
trans-unit.target: 将两个映像添加到的项目资源。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 添加或删除资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d)。

trans-unit.source: You can then run this code in the generated Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以在生成的功能区类中运行此代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut of the button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置按钮的键盘快捷键。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the keyboard shortcut of the button.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示该按钮的键盘快捷键的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters.
trans-unit.target: 快捷键提示必须介于 1 到 3 个大写字符，并且必须包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls.
trans-unit.target: 键提示有时也称为访问密钥或快捷键，可用作激活控件的快捷组合键。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key.
trans-unit.target: 当你按下 ALT 键时，键提示将显示在功能区上。

trans-unit.source: If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果内置控件或从其他加载项，则与键提示中你快捷键提示相冲突，Microsoft Office 可能自动分配不冲突快捷键提示值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用键盘来使用功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns a KeyTip to a button and a check box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将快捷键提示分配给一个按钮和复选框。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**到通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目的项。

trans-unit.source: Add a group to the custom tab.
trans-unit.target: 将组添加到自定义选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Add a button and a check box to the group.
trans-unit.target: 向组添加一个按钮和复选框。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed on the button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在按钮上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text that is displayed on the button.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示该按钮上显示的文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: To hide the label, set <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowLabel%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏标签，设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowLabel%2A>到`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image to display on the button, if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.
trans-unit.target: 如果想使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置在按钮上显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this control.
trans-unit.target: 作为此控件图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A> property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A>属性标识由控件显示 Office 图标。

trans-unit.source: The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon.
trans-unit.target: 属性值是一个字符串，标识`imageMso`所选图标的值。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at design time or at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行时中更新此属性，将更新控件的外观，以反映更改。

trans-unit.source: For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760).
trans-unit.target: 有关的列表`imageMso`值，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页面[Office 2010 外接程序： 图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Images identified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A> property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A> property, because the images are cached in the Office application.
trans-unit.target: 标识的图像<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A>属性可以由标识的图像以外会稍微快一些加载<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A>属性，因为这些图像缓存在 Office 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A> property must be `true` for the control to display the image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A>属性必须为`true`要显示图像的控件。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A> property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A>属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A> property at run time, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A> property to `true` in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A>属性在运行时，你必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`在代码中。

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns a Microsoft Office icon to a button.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将 Microsoft Office 图标分配至一个按钮。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**到通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目的项。

trans-unit.source: Add a group to the custom tab.
trans-unit.target: 将组添加到自定义选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Add a button to the group.
trans-unit.target: 向组添加一个按钮。

trans-unit.source: Set the **(Name)** property of the button to `mySaveButton`.
trans-unit.target: 设置**（名称）**到按钮属性`mySaveButton`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the button, if the button is on the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 如果按钮位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上，请获取或设置该按钮的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> that represents the position of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton" />, if the control is on the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton" /> 的位置（如果该控件位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Position%2A> property has no effect when the button is placed in a group on the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Position%2A>属性时按钮放置在功能区上的组没有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add Controls to the Backstage View](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 将控件添加到 Backstage 视图](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets tooltip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当用户将指针移到按钮上方时显示的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: The tooltip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the button.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将指针移到按钮上方时显示的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: The ScreenTip value must be less than 1024 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: 屏幕提示值必须少于 1024年个字符的长度。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.SuperTip%2A> property is set, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ScreenTip%2A> value appears as the title of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.SuperTip%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.SuperTip%2A>设置属性，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ScreenTip%2A>值将显示的标题为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.SuperTip%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the image that is associated with the button is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与按钮关联的图像是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the image that is associated with the button is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果与按钮关联的图像可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ImageName%2A>, or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A> property in the Ribbon Designer.
trans-unit.target: 此属性自动设置为`true`如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ImageName%2A>，或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A>在功能区设计器中的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can set it to `false` to cause the image associated with this control to be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将其设置为`false`若要使此控制选项可隐藏与关联的图像。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ImageName%2A>, or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A> property at run time does not change the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Image%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ImageName%2A>，或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.OfficeImageId%2A>属性在运行时不会更改的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect for instances of this button that are displayed on the Quick Access Toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不起作用的此实例按钮快速访问工具栏上显示。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSize%2A> property is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`, the button behaves as if <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A> is always `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSize%2A>属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`，按钮的行为就像<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowImage%2A>始终`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the label for the button is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示按钮的标签是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the label for the button is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按钮的标签可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSize%2A> property is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`, the button behaves as if <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowLabel%2A> is always `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSize%2A>属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`，按钮的行为就像<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ShowLabel%2A>始终`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当用户将指针移到按钮上方时显示的多行提示文本。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the button.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含当用户将指针移到按钮上时显示的多行提示文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string must be less than 1024 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: 字符串必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.SuperTip%2A> appears under <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ScreenTip%2A> text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.SuperTip%2A>下显示<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ScreenTip%2A>文本。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ScreenTip%2A>, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.SuperTip%2A> enables line breaks in the string.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ScreenTip%2A>、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton.SuperTip%2A>字符串中的启用分行符。
